bio.name: Phani Sri Kalidindi
bio.text: Full Stack Developer with 2 years of experience building scalable web apps using React.js, TypeScript, .NET Core, and SQL. Passionate about clean architecture and solving real-world problems.

title: About
Me
about.text: I'm a Full Stack Developer with 2 years of experience building interactive, scalable, and data-driven web applications. I've developed enterprise tools for Walmart, including a Supply Chain Management System and a Deduction Management Tool. I'm proficient in React.js, TypeScript, JavaScript (ES6+), Redux, and modern UI libraries like Material UI and Kendo UI. I specialize in integrating RESTful APIs, optimizing performance with techniques like lazy loading and code splitting, and implementing secure authentication using Auth0. On the backend, I have experience with C#, .NET Core, and SQL, and I focus on writing clean, maintainable code. I'm also experienced with unit testing to ensure code quality and reliability. I enjoy solving complex problems, collaborating in Agile teams, and building solutions that deliver real business value.

sections.title: Supply Chain SSO
sections.text: Took ownership of the front-end development for an order optimization tool that managed order flows from  vendor DCs to Walmart stores and  distribution centers. Designed scalable UI components using React.js, TypeScript, and Redux, optimizing performance with lazy loading, virtual scrolling, caching, and versioning. Integrated REST APIs for real-time updates and implemented secure authentication using Auth0. Collaborated with senior developers and the tech lead to shape the project architecture, refine API responses, and ensure a maintainable, high-quality product.

sections.title: Deductions
sections.text: Designed and developed a tool using Tesseract OCR and C# to extract data from scanned PODs, reducing manual effort and improving accuracy. Built a grid-based document management interface with advanced search for efficient upload, retrieval, and management. Created interactive dashboards with charts and KPIs for real-time deduction tracking and insights. Collaborated with the team to ensure seamless development and consistent UI/UX across the application.

sections.title: Internship Project
sections.text: Acquired full-stack development skills in React.js, JavaScript, Redux, Kendo UI, C#, .NET Core, and SQL. Built sample web applications with CRUD operations, UI design, and state management. Gained hands-on experience writing SQL queries and integrating backend services using .NET Core. Applied practical knowledge to deliver end-to-end solutions while demonstrating strong problem-solving skills, adaptability, and effective collaboration.
